price: İki topluluk birbirini görünce, Musa’nın adamları: "İşte yakalandık." dediler.
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
